review: Dr. Kavita is very polite, interactive and understanding. I have taken my mother to her clinic multiple times and she never prescribed more than what is absolutely necessary for the patient.  She listens patiently and explains the underlying causes as well as required medicines which is very useful information. We are so much dependent on our doctors for proper care, I feel really blessed to have discovered her. Thank you so much.
reply_text: Thanks alotüôèüôè
